document_data.name: Dispel Ward
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispel ward''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[abjuration]] [[spell]] from the [[wards sphere]] used only by specialty priests devoted to [[Set]] called [[Nighthunter]]s. It resembled a limited form of the ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: This spell was capable of cancelling magical wards, such as any spell from the wards sphere, ''[[wizard lock]]'', ''[[symbol]]'', ''[[glyph of warding]]'', and similar spells. It was a weaker version of the ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell and depended on the priest's skill for success. This spell had no effect against "wall" spells such as ''[[wall of fire]]'' or "sphere" spells such as ''[[prismatic sphere]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
